title: Robert Woodson, "Red, White, and Black: Rescuing American History from Revisionists and Race Hustlers"
description:
American history is being replaced with a polarizing version according to Woodson Center founder and president Robert Woodson. He's interviewed by Harvard Law professor and author Randall Kennedy.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
